::Shadow Wing::

She turned away from her welding and looked at Lunarpine.  She smiled 
at him and turned to face her work.  She was wanting to take some 
time off from the war and spent it with him.  She wanted to go 
fishing and walking around with him. Sit and watch the sun set, and 
then after a bit watch the sun rise.  She knew that when that 
happened, she would find ways keep him awake long enough to watch the 
sun rise. She smiled at the thought. She loved just being near him 
and with him.  For now, she would have to be content with sitting 
next to him in the dining hall. She gave a dissapointed sigh, she 
didn't want to have to wait untill the end of the war to be with the 
one bot she loved.  

she turned to the new bot. "How's that patch coming?" She looked at 
her's. "I'm done with this one." She went over and grabbed another 
peice of sheet metal and started to weld another section onto the 
hull.
